resources.string: This permission allows launching an activity in this application

About SocialEventPlanner
 Users log on to a system in which they can
 create social events to share with other users.
 You must have an account and log into the system to use it.
 Upon logging in the Event Screen will be displayed.
 On the Event Screen every event along with the time,
 location, and creating user will be displayed in
 chronological order.
 Each individual event can be clicked on and the details displayed.
 On the Details Screen the: event name, location, creating user,
 location, details of the event, associated picture,
 and google maps location will be displayed.
 On the Details screen will be an option to
 add the event to your external calendar.
